title: Guest communications | Help Center
article: Caretakers are typically the main point of contact for guests. That said, every time a guest messages your caretaker, you'll be able to view the messages on the Fairly website so you can jump in at any time. For more information on how guest messaging works, check out this article.
claude_summary: Caretakers are the primary guest contact point, but owners can view and join all guest messages on Fairly's website at any time.
